itemDescription: British basketball player and reality show star

wikipedia_page.main:
Ovie Soko (born 7 February 1991) is a British professional basketball player who played for Shiga Lakestars of the B.League and the Great Britain Men's National Basketball Team. Soko played college basketball for the University of Alabama at Birmingham and Duquesne University. He entered the 2014 NBA draft but he was not selected in the draft's two rounds. Soko is of Nigerian heritage on both his paternal and maternal sides.
In 2019, he joined the fifth series of British reality show Love Island. He placed third in the show.
